meanings.definition: Engaging in a physical struggle or fight
meanings.sent1: The two wrestlers were grappling fiercely on the mat.
meanings.sent2: The fighters were grappling for control in the ring.
meanings.sent3: The siblings playfully grappled over the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was grappling with her inner demons.
meanings.sent5: The image of the knights grappling in battle was etched in his mind.

meanings.definition: Seizing or holding onto something firmly
meanings.sent1: He was grappling with the rope to pull himself up.
meanings.sent2: The cat was grappling with the toy mouse in its paws.
meanings.sent3: She grappled with the jar lid, trying to open it.
meanings.sent4: The tree branches were grappling with each other in the wind.
meanings.sent5: His hands were grappling with the heavy suitcase, trying to lift it.

meanings.definition: Dealing with a difficult or challenging situation
meanings.sent1: She was grappling with the complex math problem.
meanings.sent2: The team was grappling with the loss of their captain.
meanings.sent3: He grappled with the decision of which college to attend.
meanings.sent4: The company was grappling with financial difficulties.
meanings.sent5: The community was grappling with the aftermath of the storm.
